QuestData.Title: A Wing and a Prayer
QuestData.Description: The time has come to face Eregos.$b$bHe draws strength from the energies he is charged with defending - sipping from the well of the great aspect Malygos.$b$bHowever, defeating the Mage-Lord has allowed us to unlock the full power of our drakes. Use them wisely and Eregos shall surely fall.
QuestData.LogDescription: Belgaristrasz wants you to kill Eregos in the Oculus.
QuestData.CompletionText: Do you bring news of Belgaristrasz?
QuestData.RewardText: I can already feel their defenses weakening!$b$bNot since the onset of this conflict have we dealt a blow of this magnitude to the Lord of Magic.$b$bDo not forget to visit Eregos' cache. Surely some of his treasures will interest you.
